acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params._amount: The amount of Taiko token to deposit.

returns.verifiedAt_: The timestamp this block is verified at.
The timestamp this block is verified at.

getStateVariables().details: This method can be deleted once node/client stops using it.

returns._0: The state transition data of the block.
The state transition data of the block.

returns.prover_: The prover's address. If the block is not verified yet, address(0) will be returned.

params._genesisBlockHash: The block hash of the genesis block.
params._owner: The owner of this contract. msg.sender will be used if this value is zero.
params._toPause: true to pause the contract by default.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

params._params: Block parameters, currently an encoded BlockParams object.
params._txList: txList data if calldata is used for DA.

returns.meta_: The metadata of the proposed L2 block.

params._params: Block parameters, an encoded BlockParamsV2 object.
params._txList: txList data if calldata is used for DA.

returns.meta_: The metadata of the proposed L2 block.

params._paramsArr: A list of encoded BlockParamsV2 objects.

returns.metaArr_: The metadata objects of the proposed L2 blocks.

params._blockId: The index of the block to prove. This is also used to select the right implementation version.

params._batchProof: An abi-encoded TaikoData.TierProof that contains the batch/aggregated proof for the given blocks.
params._blockIds: The indices of the blocks to prove.
params._inputs: An list of abi-encoded (TaikoData.BlockMetadata, TaikoData.Transition, TaikoData.TierProof) tuples.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._allowZeroAddress: If set to true, does not throw if the resolved address is `address(0)`.
params._name: Name whose address is to be resolved.

returns._0: Address associated with the given name.

params._allowZeroAddress: If set to true, does not throw if the resolved address is `address(0)`.
params._name: Name whose address is to be resolved.

returns._0: Address associated with the given name on the specified chain.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

params._maxBlocksToVerify: Max number of blocks to verify.

params._amount: The amount of Taiko token to withdraw.

bondBalanceOf(address).notice: Gets the current bond balance of a given address.

depositBond(uint256).notice: Deposits Taiko token to be used as bonds.

getBlock(uint64).notice: Gets the details of a block.

getBlockV2(uint64).notice: Gets the details of a block.

getConfig().notice: Gets the configuration of the TaikoL1 contract.

getLastSyncedBlock().notice: Returns information about the last synchronized block.

getLastVerifiedBlock().notice: Returns information about the last verified block.

getStateVariables().notice: Gets the state variables of the TaikoL1 contract.

getTransition(uint64,bytes32).notice: Gets the state transition for a specific block.

getTransition(uint64,uint32).notice: Gets the state transition for a specific block.

getVerifiedBlockProver(uint64).notice: Gets the prover that actually proved a verified block.

paused().notice: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

proveBlock(uint64,bytes).notice: Proves or contests a block transition.

proveBlocks(uint64[],bytes[],bytes).notice: Proves or contests multiple block transitions (version 2)

resolve(bytes32,bool).notice: Resolves a name to its address deployed on this chain.

resolve(uint64,bytes32,bool).notice: Resolves a name to its address deployed on a specified chain.

verifyBlocks(uint64).notice: Verifies up to a certain number of blocks.
